summary: While traveling in France during the Nazi invasion of 1940, an Englishman is entrusted with the care of a group of refugee children.
cast: Monty Woolley|Roddy McDowall|Anne Baxter|Otto Preminger|J. Carrol Naish|Lester Matthews|Jill Esmond|Ferike Boros|Peggy Ann Garner|Merrill Rodin|Maurice Tauzin|Fleurette Zama|William Edmunds|Marcel Dalio|Marcelle Corday|Odette Myrtil|Jean Del Val|Rudolph Anders|Henry Rowland|Helmut Dantine|George Davis|Fred Aldrich|Edward Ashley|Wilson Benge|Adrienne D'Ambricourt|Jean De Briac|Mici Goty|Henry Guttman|Ernst Hauessermann|Brandon Hurst|Julika|Thomas Louden|Morton Lowry|Manuel Par√≠s|Otto Reichow|Harry Semels|Hans von Morhart|Hans Heinrich von Twardowski|William Yetter Sr.
title: The Pied Piper
